description: This file is a Django URL configuration module that maps URL patterns to view functions and class-based views related to a note-taking application's API.

classes.name: NoteListCreateAPIView
classes.description: A Django REST Framework view for listing and creating notes.

classes.name: NoteRetrieveUpdateDestroyAPIView
classes.description: A Django REST Framework view for retrieving, updating, and deleting individual notes.

methods.name: health
methods.description: A view function to check the health status of the API server.
